resources:
Quizzes 1. When programming in Java, the constructor of a child class must contain what call?\
super(); this(); this.super(); super.child_class_name(); 2. What keyword do you use when you want a class to inherit from a parent class (ex. public class MainActivity _____ AppCompatActivity)?
Arg[] extends void static 3. What is another word for a super Class?
child parent superduper father 4. What is the first step for planning super classes and sub classes?
Coding Drawing Planning Good thoughts
Submit
